thread.title: Got a better offer? Reason for Chloe Ferry missing CBB finale is revealed
thread.title_full: Got a better offer? Reason for Chloe Ferry missing CBB finale is revealed

author: mirror
title: Got a better offer? Reason for Chloe Ferry missing CBB finale is revealed
text:
Got a better offer? Reason for Chloe Ferry missing CBB finale is revealed The reality TV personality is notable absent from the Channel 5 show's climax Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
She was one of the most controversial housemates in this year's Celebrity Big Brother , but fans of Chloe Ferry will be disappointed if they tune into Channel 5's reality show final, tonight - because she won't be part of the action. 
The buxom brunette, who shot to fame on Geordie Shore, has snubbed tonight's climactic ending in favour of another gig which a representative confirmed. 
Explaining why she won't feature with her former co-stars, a representative for the reality TV star performer said: "Unfortunately Chloe is out of the country filming. If her schedule was different, she would be there cheering them on." 
It's believed she is in Switzerland filming the new series of Geordie Shore. (Photo: Rex Features) Chloe Ferry in the diary room (Photo: Rex Features) (Photo: Channel 5)
